tiles.name: Parking Lot Entrance
tiles.description: The entrance to the strip mall parking lot. Pavement stretches towards the storefronts. Arid climate, minimal water presence reflected in the cracked asphalt.

tiles.name: Strip Mall Facade
tiles.description: Exterior view of the strip mall. Saul Goodman's office is somewhere along this stretch. Tacky signs and concrete construction.

tiles.name: Adjacent Business (Nail Salon)
tiles.description: The storefront of a nail salon, located next to Saul's office. Part of the strip mall chunk.

tiles.name: Waiting Area
tiles.description: The waiting area outside Saul Goodman's office. Cheap furniture and questionable artwork adorn the space.

tiles.name: Saul's Office Entrance
tiles.description: The entrance to Saul Goodman's office, marked by faux-Greek columns. Office carpet and drywall are the dominant materials.

tiles.name: Saul's Cluttered Desk
tiles.description: Saul Goodman's desk, covered in paperwork and various items. Reflects the tone and atmosphere of desperation and slight sleaze.

tiles.name: Filing Cabinets
tiles.description: Filing cabinets containing potentially questionable documents. A key feature of Saul's office.

tiles.name: Back Room Entrance
tiles.description: The entrance to a storage area in the back of the office.

tiles.name: Back Room Storage
tiles.description: Cluttered storage area, potentially containing evidence or supplies. The backroom reflects the 'tacky' atmosphere.
